overview: In a quirky little town in the sky lives an even smaller, chubby protagonist of the story â€“ Kodleduk. This little man's obsession has possessed the whole city. Nothing goes unnoticed in Kodleduk's tiny studio, as he records everything around. All sounds and actions go straight to organic machines created by his teeny, nimble fingers. They encapsulate the town's spirit, and Kodleduk never feels lonely in his tiny apartment.
title: Kodleduk
